title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin is buying into #2 overall pick Chet Holmgren after what he saw in the Summer League and why he fits in today's NBA. He reacts to breaking news out of the NFL with Browns trading QB Baker Mayfield to the Panthers. He believes the Panthers are one of the better landing spots for Mayfield and gives you several reasons why. Plus, NFL analyst Bucky Brooks joins the show in studio to explain why Mayfield might struggle to win the starting job in Carolina. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
